title: If i roast someone is it considered being toxic?
body:
So today i decided to roast my team in champ select out of friendieness and i got reported after the game
basically my words were... 
"player name" i bet you wore chokers before they were in style boom roasted
"player name" i bet you share black eye liner with your old lesbian sister boom roasted
"player name" you locked quinn boom roasted
"player name" ... boom roasted

theyre alot more funny and understandable when you know the player names but as you can see these arent at all haneous and can obviously be recognized as me having fun
do you think i deserves the reports? :(

replies.body: but were the roasts atleast good?
If it is intentionally intended to anger or insult, yes, it is toxic. Use your head.
If people get upset and report you, yes. If they don't, no.
You'd be hard pressed to find anything that Riot and its community doesn't consider as "toxic". Yes, those kind of remarks could be considered "harassment" and could get you reported and banned.
